name: member-card
effect: Provides access to Newmoon Island and Darkrai.
short_effect: Allows access to Newmoon Island and Darkrai.

flavor_text.sun_moon: A card needed for entering the inn in Canalave City. Oddly, the last date marked on it was 50 years ago.
